data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Davie, Peter J. F., Ng, Peter K. L. (2013): A review of Chiromantes obtusifrons (Dana, 1851) (Decapoda: Brachyura: Sesarmidae), with descriptions of four new sibling-species from Christmas Island (Indian Ocean), Guam and Taiwan. Zootaxa 3609 (1): 1-25, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3609.1.1
